job_purpose: Design and implement custom data integration solutions for enterprise mining customers, focusing on customer integration initiatives.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design and implement custom data integration solutions for enterprise mining customers
Build and maintain robust ETL pipelines connecting customer systems to the platform
Write custom Python, Node.js, or shell scripts for data transformations
Manage data warehouse operations using Snowflake
Provide technical consultation during integration processes
Drive improvements in integration tools and processes
Participate in client meetings to understand data requirements
required_qualifications: Experience with Python and data pipelines in a production environment
Practical understanding of ETL/ELT processes and data pipeline orchestration tools
Experience with API integrations, webhooks, and data streaming technologies
Familiarity with cloud services like AWS
Ability to write clean, maintainable scripts in Python, Node.js, and shell
Strong communication skills and attention to detail
company_details: CorePlan is a Perth tech startup revolutionizing mining operations with a digital SaaS drilling management platform. The company aims to advance digital drilling operations in mining through innovative solutions and a high-performing team.
